p: The carbon, nitrogen and phosphorus concentrations in the realistic hand washing water are based on real-world measurements conducted in hand washing water ( Jefferson et al., 2004), and the target concentrations for all other elements using measurements conducted in combined greywater ( Jefferson et al., 2001). These values are generally consistent with the diversity of measurements presented in Section 1.1.1. The nutrient-balanced composition is based on supplementing any deficient nutrients, to satisfy the nutrient-balancing requirements.
